channel.title: Prices....Again
channel.description:
I'm here to ask the never ending question, how can I change shop prices?? please don't just say, "in shops.cfg" cause I still on't know. Please be VERY detailed!
Thanks, Play For Keeps

item.title: Prices....Again
item.dc:creator: @Play_For_Keeps Play For Keeps
item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

here is my dharoks axe, In game its around 11mil in shops

item = 4718 Dharoks_greataxe Dharok_the_Wretched's_greataxe. 18000000 18000000 20000000 -4 103 95 -4 0 0 0 0 0 -1 105 0

where is the price?

Read full topic

item.title: Prices....Again
item.dc:creator: @ownage_plz ownage plz
item.description:
@ownage_plz wrote:

Go into item.cfg … the first 3 numbers after the description are the high alch, low alch, and shop prices.

Read full topic
